Name: Class with Excessive Number of Child Classes
Description:
A class contains an unnecessarily large number of
					children.
ExtendedDescription: This issue makes it more difficult to understand and maintain the software, which indirectly affects security by making it more difficult or time-consuming to find and/or fix vulnerabilities.  It also might make it easier to introduce vulnerabilities.
While the interpretation of "large number of children" may vary for each product or developer, CISQ recommends a default maximum of 10 child classes.
